Detailed Description

Token in a Boolean expression.

A Boolean expression is made up of a sequence of tokens. This class represents such a token.

Definition at line 42 of file Token.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Token::Token (  char  ch = ' '  ) 
 

Set this token based on a character.

The character is a letter ('a' to 'z'), a zero or a one, or an operation symbol. We convert the letter into a proper token.
